SELECT EEI.PLNT_CD, EEI.EQM_CD, EEI.EQM_NM, EEI.EQM_DIV, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = EQM_DIV) AS EQM_DIV_NM, EEI.EQM_CRST, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = EQM_CRST) AS EQM_CRST_NM, EEI.EQM_STT, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = EQM_STT) AS EQM_STT_NM, EEI.IST_PLA, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = IST_PLA) AS IST_PLA_NM, EEI.MAK_COMP, EEI.SPL_COMP, EEI.MOD_NM, EEI.SRL_NO, EEI.CRG_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = EEI.CRG_UID) AS CRG_NM, EEI.IQ, EEI.OQ, EEI.PQ, EEI.APR_NO, EEI.CHK_CYL, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = CHK_CYL) AS CHK_CYL_NM, EEI.QUA_CYL, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = QUA_CYL) AS QUA_CYL_NM, EEI.CAL_CYL, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = CAL_CYL) AS CAL_CYL_NM, EEI.ETR_DT, EEI.IST_DT, EEI.DPS_DT, EEI.QUAL_APR_DT, EEI.CAL_APR_DT, EEI.RGL_CHK_APR_DT, EEI.USE_RNG, EEI.QTT_RNG, EEI.RMK, NVL(EEI.EQM_FILE_IDX, 0) AS EQM_FILE_IDX, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SY_FILE_INFO WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND FILE_IDX = EEI.EQM_FILE_IDX AND DEL_YN = 'N') || ' ê±´' AS EQM_FILE_CNT, EEI.SAP_AST_NO, EEI.SAP_AST_NM, EEI.SAP_CRT_DT, EEI.SAP_CHG_DT, EEI.SAP_ACQ_DT, EEI.SAP_SALE_DPS_DT, EEI.SAP_ADD_DESC, EEI.SAP_CRG_NM_EMID, EEI.SAP_COSC, EEI.SAP_ORCO, EEI.SAP_ACCD, EEI.PMS_CHK_TAGT_YN FROM EM_EQM_INFO EEI WHERE EEI.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND EEI.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND EEI.EQM_DIV = #{eqmDiv}
AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(EEI.EQM_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{eqmCd}) || '%'
AND TO_DATE(EEI.DPS_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dpsDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{dpsDt})
AND TO_DATE(EEI.QUAL_APR_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{qualAprDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{qualAprDtList[1]})
AND TO_DATE(EEI.CAL_APR_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{calAprDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{calAprDtList[1]})
AND EQM_STT = #{eqmStt}
AND TO_DATE(EEI.RGL_CHK_APR_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{rglChkAprDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{rglChkAprDtList[1]})
ORDER BY EEI.UDT_DS

SELECT EEH.PLNT_CD, EEH.EQM_CD, EEH.HIS_SEQ, EEH.EQM_HIS_DIV, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = EEH.EQM_HIS_DIV) AS EQM_HIS_DIV_NM, EEH.EQM_HIS_PROC_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_Cd = EEH.EQM_HIS_PROC_CD) AS EQM_HIS_PROC_NM, EEH.EQM_HIS_APR_IDX, EEH.RJT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = EEH.RJT_UID) AS RJT_NM, EEH.RJT_DS, EEH.RJT_REA, EEH.RGT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = EEH.RGT_UID) AS RGT_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EEH.RGT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RGT_DT, EEH.ANS_DT, EEH.RMK, EEH.HIS_FILE_IDX FROM EM_EQM_HIS EEH WHERE EEH.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND EEH.DEL_YN = 'N' AND EEH.EQM_CD = #{eqmCd} ORDER BY EEH.UDT_DS
